text:
The tomb entrance yawns before you, wide enough to swallow a siege beast. Moss drips from the ceiling, and the air is colder hereâ€”unnaturally so. You descend the stone steps into silence, broken only by your breath and the clatter of pebbles. Ancient murals line the walls: depictions of nameless kings casting shadows over kneeling throngs. Yet their faces have been scratched away.

Something is sealed here, and it fears memory. The deeper you tread, the more you feel your own identity erode. Only purpose remains. Welcome to the Hollow Catacombs.
lore: The Hollow Catacombs predate even the First Flame. It was said the dead could not rest until the Cycle was broken. Many entered in search of answers. Most became the answer.
